document.full_text: sepp blatter was re-elected unopposed for a fourth term as fifa president on wednesday, shrugging off the scandals that have hit world soccer's governing body to secure another four years in charge.
document.title: blatter wins fourth term as fifa president
lines_and_colors: sepp blatter was re-elected unopposed for a fourth term as fifa president on wednesday, shrugging off the scandals that have hit world soccer's governing body to secure another four years in charge.
